participant_1.background:
I like to eat sushi when I'm not at the archery center.
i have a bicycle.
I enjoy the food network and HGTV while I'm on my diet.
I have been exposed to a variety of cultures and lifestyles due to my upbringing.
I live in the US and work out in my home gym every day to stay fit

participant_2.background:
I've been single my whole life, but I'm hoping to find someone special one day.
I am proud of my discipline and commitment to my education, despite my sweet tooth.
I am not a fashion diva, but I like to take care of my appearance.
i am a professional horse racing handicapper.
I spent my last birthday working on a new project for my YouTube channel.

content.text: I am trying to get fit, so I have been working out in my home gym every day.
It is great that you are trying to get fit! What kind of exercises do you do?
I like to do a lot of cardio, like running and biking.
That is great! I am more of a strength training person myself, but I do like to go for walks sometimes.
I have been trying to learn archery lately, but I am not very good at it.
That is so cool! I have always wanted to learn archery, but I have never had the chance.
It is fun, but it can be a little challenging at first.
I am sure I would be terrible at it! I am not very coordinated.
Well, you can always try it out! You might surprise yourself.
I might just do that! I have always wanted to try something new.
I am sure you will be great at it!
